description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=3/3. 3D Action RPG. Attack large ogres with your sword! Break the helmets! This game contains 9 stages and 5 swords! Ver 1.01 FPS(Frame per second) became better. Stage1's goblins became weaker. Ver 1.02 no garbage collection(no stop motion)
description.short: 3D Action RPG. Attack large ogres with your sword! Break the helmets! This game contains 9 stages and 5 swords! Ver 1.01 FPS(Frame per second) became better. Stage1's goblins became weaker. Ver 1.02 no garbage collection(no stop motion)
